sentence.Network_en: Discussion also made for the formation and evolution mechanism of sylvite nitrate.
sentence.Network_cn: 探讨了硝酸钾盐的形成演化机理.

sentence.Network_en: Chemical fertilizer remains the main consumption channel of sylvite.
sentence.Network_cn: 化肥仍然是钾盐的主要消费渠道.

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Lu: including magnesium salt, sylvite, lithium salt, etc. and only chloride was edible.
sentence.Network_cn: 陆总: 有镁盐, 钾盐, 锂盐等,只有氯化钠盐才可以食用.

world sylvite consumption is 2 % ~ about in year of rate of fertilizer domain 3 % , last year although the Asia produced economic crisis , but the demand of sylvite still has growth .世界钾盐消费在化肥领域的年增长率约为2％～3％，去年尽管亚洲发生了经济危机，但钾盐的需求仍有增长。
钾盐矿床-钾盐矿床(英文:potassium salt deposit,sylvite deposit) 是指可以开采和提取钾元素或钾化合物的矿床。钾盐又称钾石盐,含钾52.2%。广义的钾盐矿床应包括.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin (sal digestivus) Sylvii, the old name of this salt, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a mineral consisting of native potassium chloride; an important ore of potassium that is found in sedimentary beds
